typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Rank as string,
		Name as string,
		Platform as string,
		Year as string,
		Genre as string,
		Publisher as string,
		NA_Sales as string,
		EU_Sales as string,
		JP_Sales as string,
		Other_Sales as string,
		Global_Sales as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> csv
